We must prepare ourselves."How do we prepare?"

We need to enchant our equipment to a higher degree than ever before. To manage that feat, we need to enchant equipment up to +9. At some point, we'll need masterwork alkahest to enhance the performance, but let's not get ahead of ourselves.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Right."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Don't throw that low tier feedstock away. You can combine feedstock to get a higher tier.

Good luck, my friend!
